data.message: Really wish the plonkers with nothing good to say would just shut up.  Gay or straight, old or young, black or white, why does it matter? love is between 2 people and down to individual choice. The idea of hating someone because of who they love and want to spend the rest of their lives with is wrong wrong wrong. Fully support FB with this post. Haters take your bigoted views elsewhere!

replies.message: True! But they  wanna  push their immorality in our faces. That's just like bullying. I'll spit beechnut in their eyes.
